sdAddStorageFacilityDetailsAddressText: An address must be provided for this storage facility.
sdWhatStorageFacilityText: What is the storage facility address?
hintApprovalNumber: If the storage facility has an approval number enter it here. For example, UK/ABC/001, 1 UK 22028 or TSF001.
productApprovalheadingLabel: This section is optional. You can skip it and continue. These questions will become mandatory from 10 January 2026, under new EU regulations.
sdAddStorageAddressRequired: A storage facility address must be added here.
sdStorageArrivalDateHint: This should be the date the product arrives at the storage facility. For example, 25/07/2025.
sdStorageArrivalDateInfo: This should be the date the product arrives at the storage facility. For example, 25/07/2025.
sdStorageArrivalDateGuidanceText: This is the date the product arrives at the storage facility and is unloaded. If unloading happens later, enter the date the product was physically removed from the transport and received into storage.
sdArrivalDateValidationError: Arrival date must be a real date
sdArrivalDateSameOrOneDayBeforeDeparture: Please enter an arrival date that is on or before the departure date from the UK storage facility
